name: neapolitan
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a person who lives in or is from the city of Naples in southern Italy: Many Neapolitans have emigrated in search of jobs over the past few decades. The 63-year-old Neapolitan had not conducted at Covent Garden for 20 years.

(of a person) living in, or from, the city of Naples in southern Italy: Giordano Bruno was a Neapolitan philosopher. Liberace was born in Milwaukee to a Polish mother and a Neapolitan father.
in or relating to the city of Naples in southern Italy: The film opens with a car chase through a Neapolitan suburb. Neapolitan and Sicilian cuisine are different. Contini gave a rendition of a famous Neapolitan song. See also
Neapolitan ice cream
